document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
270 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK NSPU , IMC , SKC , YKC ) from 19 provinces were studied.
Kherson Prov.
:
1 spec. ( IMK ) Kherson ,
12.v.1956
;
2 spec. ( IMC ) Tsiurupynsk env., Rafalsky leg.,
2.x.1966
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) idem,
20.xi.1966
;
Khmelnytskyi Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kamianets-Polilskyi Distr. , Bagovitsya , Grum-Grzhimajlo leg.,
21–23.vi.1895
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Holovanivske Forestry ,
9.v.1965
;
1 spec. ( IMK ) Kropyvnytskyi Distr. , Velyka Viska , 14.v
;
1 spec. ( IMK ) idem, 12.v
;
1 spec. ( IMK ) Olexandriya , 1.viii
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Dolinska Distr. , I.Pisnya leg.,
viii.1983
;
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Znamyanka Distr. , Chorny Forest , Rohocha leg.,
17.vi.1953
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Vesely Bokovenky ;
Mykolaiv Prov.
:
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Voznesensk Distr. , Trykraty
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Pershotravneve Distr. , Chausovo, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
24.iv.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Kryve Ozero , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
on
Artemisia absinthium
,
3.viii.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Voznesensk Distr. , on the bottom of irrigative channel,
3.vi.1966
;
Sumy Prov.
:
13 spec. ( ZIN ) Sumy env., Benois leg., 1891
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Trostyanetz Distr. , Neskuchayivske Forestry ,
20.vi.1952
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Trostyanets , Potarivka gully,
29.vi.1953
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Akhtyrka Distr. ,
20.vi.1952
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Lebedyn Distr. , Lifine , Goncharenko leg.,
15.vi.1953
;
1 spec. ( ZMUN ) Hlukhiv Distr. , Bereza , P.N. Sheshurak leg.,
13.vii.2005
;

Zaporizhia Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Kamyanka-Dniprovska, vi.1977 ; 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Rozyvka Distr., Kamyani Mohyly Reserve, on
Artemisia austriaca , S.V. Volovnik
leg., 15.viii.1982 ; 2 spec. ( SIZK ) idem, on
Tanacetum
, 27.vi.1980 ; 3 spec. ( SIZK ) Prymorsk Distr., Obytochna Spit, curtain of
Artemisia
in the marine coast shore, S. V . Volovnik leg., 26.viii.1982 ; 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol, forest park, on
Melilotus , S.V. Volovnik
leg., 8.vii.1977 ; 1 spec. ( SSC ) Zaporizhia , Khortytsia Island, 12.vii.1999 ; 1 spec. ( SSC ) Melitopol, S. Suchkov leg., 17.iv.2000 ; 1 spec. ( YKC ) Melitopol Distr., Chapayivka, Yu. V . Karmyshev leg., 30.vi.2013 ; 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol Distr., edge of Staroberdyansky Forest, 23.vi.1965 ;
Zhytomyr Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Zhytomyr , Proschiga leg., 9.v.1925 ; 1 spec. ( IMC ) Malin, Bogachev leg., 5.ix.1944 ; 1 spec. ( IMC ) Malin, Bogachev leg., under
Artemisia
and
Achillea
, 10.x.1944 ; 4 spec. ( IMC ) Malin, sands, under
Artemisia , Bogachev
leg., 23.x.1944 ; 1 spec. ( IMC ) Malin, pine park, Bogachev leg., 13.viii.1944 .

Biology. Grasslands, forests, sandy and ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–XI. Oligophagous on Asteraceae :
Achillea millefoilium
,
Tripleurospermum maritimum subsp. inodorum
,
Andryala integrifolia
,
Centaurea
spp.,
Artemisia
spp. ( Keppen 1882 ; Bargagli 1884 ; Gushcho 1954 ; Hoffmann 1963 ; Smreczyński 1968; Volovnik 1989 ).
